sqlMap.select: /* calendar.public.group.count */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CALENDAR_PUBLIC_GROUP WHERE CALENDAR_ID=CAST(#calendarId# AS INTEGER) GROUP_ID LIKE '%'+#searchValue#+'%'

/* calendar.public.group.list */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT CALENDAR_ID, GROUP_ID, PERMISSIONS, 1 AS IS_DELETABLE, INS_DATIM, UPD_DATIM, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY INS_DATIM) AS RNUM FROM CALENDAR_PUBLIC_GROUP WHERE CALENDAR_ID=CAST(#calendarId# AS INTEGER) GROUP_ID LIKE '%'+#searchValue#+'%' ) t1 WHERE RNUM BETWEEN $startRow$ AND $endRow$

/* calendar.public.group.detail */ SELECT CALENDAR_ID, GROUP_ID, PERMISSIONS, 1 AS IS_DELETABLE, a.INS_DATIM, a.UPD_DATIM FROM CALENDAR_PUBLIC_GROUP a WHERE CALENDAR_ID=CAST(#calendarId# AS INTEGER) AND a.GROUP_ID=#groupId#
sqlMap.delete: /* calendar.public.group.delete */ DELETE FROM CALENDAR_PUBLIC_GROUP WHERE CALENDAR_ID=CAST(#calendarId# AS INTEGER) GROUP_ID=#groupId# GROUP_ID IN #groupIds[]#
